title: Smartphone penetration as share of population in Indonesia 2017 to 2023
yAxis: Share of population with a smartphone
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Share of population with a smartphone, containing a total of 7 data points.
In general Share of population with a smartphone has rose over the Year.
Share of population with a smartphone is slightly increasing from 2017 to 2020, and lastly roughly constant from 2020 to 2023.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2017 and 2018.
Maximum Share of population with a smartphone, about 33.0 was reported at Year 2023
Minimum Share of population with a smartphone about 24.0 was reached at Year 2017
